name: Kiniro no Corda 3: Full Voice Special
overview: 8 years after the adventures of Hino Kahoko, it is now time for Kohinata Kanade to step onto the stage. Soon after transferring to Seisou Academy, Kanade finds the orchestra club in the middle of preparing for the National concert. Teaming up with the other members, she will improve her skills, meet new rivals and create memories for what will become an unforgettable summer...
